ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled   4  3  3  3  Fair attempt, but could be more persuasive and consistent with the persona of a trustworthy merchant who doesn't easily give discounts without justification. Short note: Needs to balance urgency with fairness better.

baseline_no_context             2  4  5  3  Good consistency, but lacks contextual relevance and naturalness in the bargaining situation at a harbor market during negotiations. Short note: Should incorporate more of the dynamic setting into dialogue for authenticity.
